languages.text: "Невероятная перемена. Я рад{mf||а}, что ты начала находить удовольствие в развлечениях моего круга".

traits.locale_text: "Невероятная перемена. Я рад{mf||а}, что ты начала находить удовольствие в развлечениях моего круга".

languages.text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."
languages.original_text: "Невероятная перемена. Я рад{mf||а}, что ты начала находить удовольствие в развлечениях моего круга".

traits.locale_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes customary for my peers."
"I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes customary for my peers."
"I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."
"I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."
"I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."
"I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

languages.text: "Ich staune einfach über die Veränderung. Ich bin froh, dass Ihr einen Weg gefunden habt, Euch an den Freizeitbeschäftigungen zu erfreuen, die unter meinesgleichen üblich sind."
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

traits.locale_text: "Ich staune einfach über die Veränderung. Ich bin froh, dass Ihr einen Weg gefunden habt, Euch an den Freizeitbeschäftigungen zu erfreuen, die unter meinesgleichen üblich sind."

languages.text: «Es solo que me maravilla este cambio. Me alegra que haya encontrado la forma de disfrutar de los pasatiempos tradicionales de mi posición».
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

traits.locale_text: «Es solo que me maravilla este cambio. Me alegra que haya encontrado la forma de disfrutar de los pasatiempos tradicionales de mi posición».

languages.text: 「ただ、その変化に驚かされているだけだ。私の同輩にとっては習慣である娯楽を楽しむ手段をお前が見つけたことを、嬉しく思っている」
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ、その変化に驚かされているだけだ。私の同輩にとっては習慣である娯楽を楽しむ手段をお前が見つけたことを、嬉しく思っている」

languages.text: “我只是对这样的变化感到惊讶不已。这样的消遣对我们这种人而言习以为常，我很高兴你也能充分享受这一切。”
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

traits.locale_text: “我只是对这样的变化感到惊讶不已。这样的消遣对我们这种人而言习以为常，我很高兴你也能充分享受这一切。”

languages.text: « C'est un changement bienvenu. Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} que vous appréciez enfin les passe-temps qui sont coutumiers à mes pairs. »
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un changement bienvenu. Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} que vous appréciez enfin les passe-temps qui sont coutumiers à mes pairs. »

languages.text: "Değişimi takdir ederim, hepsi bu. Denklerimin alışılagelmiş oyunlarından keyif almanın bir yolunu bulduğun için memnunum."
languages.original_text: "I simply marvel at the change. I am glad that you have found a way to enjoy the pastimes that are customary to my peers."
